checklist.name: Site Plan with Setbacks
checklist.description: Detailed site plan showing building location, property lines, setbacks, and dimensions
checklist.notes: Must show all existing and proposed structures

checklist.name: Architectural Drawings (Plans, Elevations, Sections)
checklist.description: Complete architectural plans including floor plans, all elevations, and building sections
checklist.notes: All drawings must be to scale with dimensions clearly marked

checklist.name: Structural Plans and Calculations
checklist.description: Structural engineering plans and design calculations
checklist.notes: Must be stamped by Massachusetts-registered Professional Engineer

checklist.name: Zoning Analysis and Compliance Statement
checklist.description: Detailed zoning analysis demonstrating code compliance
checklist.notes: Include dimensional analysis (FAR, height, setbacks, lot coverage)

checklist.name: Building Energy Code Compliance Form
checklist.description: Massachusetts Stretch Energy Code compliance documentation
checklist.notes: Boston follows MA Stretch Energy Code (780 CMR Appendix 115.AA)

checklist.name: Mechanical/HVAC Plans
checklist.description: Heating, cooling, and ventilation system plans
checklist.notes: Include equipment schedules and ductwork layout

checklist.name: Plumbing Plans
checklist.description: Plumbing system layout showing fixtures, pipes, and connections
checklist.notes: Show all fixtures, water service, and sanitary drainage

checklist.name: Electrical Plans
checklist.description: Electrical system plans including service, panels, and circuits
checklist.notes: Include panel schedules and load calculations

checklist.name: Fire Protection Plans
checklist.description: Fire alarm and sprinkler system plans
checklist.notes: Required for commercial and multi-family residential buildings

checklist.name: Stormwater Management Plan
checklist.notes: Must comply with Boston Water and Sewer Commission standards

checklist.name: Traffic Impact Study
checklist.description: Transportation impact assessment for large projects

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for projects generating 100+ peak hour trips

checklist.name: Environmental Notification Form
checklist.description: MEPA environmental review for qualifying projects

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for projects meeting MEPA thresholds

checklist.name: Historic Commission Approval
checklist.description: Boston Landmarks Commission review and approval

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for work on designated landmarks or in historic districts

checklist.notes: Required in Back Bay, Beacon Hill, and other historic districts
